item.title: Countdown to New Year 2026
item.description:
<![CDATA[Count the seconds to the New Year in any location or time zone.
@@ -1,8 +1,8 @@ --- title: Countdown to New Year 2026 source_url: https://www.timeanddate.com/counters/newyear.html -scraped_at: 2025-08-12T02:37:32.800529+00:00 -content_hash: b97fddae8c5ff0cc9d795a40eae467ec7b6e317d71baeb48da52a43fe6a64707 +scraped_at: 2025-08-12T02:37:40.820776+00:00 +content_hash: 103aef6061c18fccfa320829e5cb08d309cf4689bec2f4c22f2115fb7324a14e feed_name: new-years-even-counter ---
@@ -15,18 +15,18 @@ hours 204622 minutes
-12277348 +12277340 seconds
until Thursday, January 1, 2026 ([Raleigh](/worldclock/usa/raleigh) time)
-142 days, 2 hours, 22 minutes, 28 seconds +142 days, 2 hours, 22 minutes, 20 seconds
until Thursday, January 1, 2026 ([Raleigh](/worldclock/usa/raleigh) time)
[One hour wrong? Daylight Saving Time!](/countdown/one-hour-off)
-Current time is Monday, August 11, 2025 at 10:37:32 pm [EDT](/time/zones/edt) (local time in [Raleigh](/worldclock/usa/raleigh)) +Current time is Monday, August 11, 2025 at 10:37:40 pm [EDT](/time/zones/edt) (local time in [Raleigh](/worldclock/usa/raleigh))
You may need to press Reload or Refresh on your browser to update the numbers. ]]>

item.title: Countdown to New Year 2026
item.description:
- - + + @@ -26,17 +26,17 @@ minutes - 12294624 + 12294618 seconds

until Thursday, January 1, 2026 (Raleigh time)

-

142 days, 7 hours, 10 minutes, 24 seconds

+

142 days, 7 hours, 10 minutes, 18 seconds

until Thursday, January 1, 2026 (Raleigh time)

One hour wrong? Daylight Saving Time!

-

Current time is Monday, August 11, 2025 at 5:49:36 pm EDT (local time in Raleigh)

+

Current time is Monday, August 11, 2025 at 5:49:42 pm EDT (local time in Raleigh)

You may need to press Reload or Refresh on your browser to update the numbers.

Full-Screen Countdown

The links below will open in a new popup window, some popup-blockers might block them from opening.

]]>
